abstract: German qualifier Michael Berrer upsets Rafael Nadal in his season debut at the Qatar Open; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Second-seeded Rafael Nadal, the defending champion, lost his first match of the season at the Qatar Open against a German qualifier, Michael Berrer.
snippet: Second-seeded Rafael Nadal, the defending champion, lost his first match of the season at the Qatar Open against a German qualifier, Michael Berrer.
